DOC.brief_summary: The main goal for this study is to assess concerns and barriers to research participation by pregnant women through an anonymous online survey (www.pbrc.edu/ParticipateWhilePregnantSurvey).
DOC.detailed_description: Participants will complete an online survey distributed through HIPAA compliant REDCap database. Collected data will consist of general multiple choice responses and optional "write-in" responses (e.g. providing a personal response for elaboration an "Other" option). No private health information will be collected.
DOC.criteria: Any individual may complete this survey.
